branchCategory.name: AW*-X2622, Filter Regulator, Stainless Steel 316 and Special Temperature Environment (-40°C)
branchCategory.description: <p>AW-X2622 is a 316 stainless steel filter regulator with an enhanced temperature range.  This model is capable of operation in ambient temperatures of -40 to -176<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">°F (-40 to 80</span><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">°C) and line pressures up to 290 psi (2.0 MPa).</span></p>
